content: The "Border Patrol Pay Reform Act of 2013" may be cited as the short title. It establishes the Border Patrol rate of pay. The purpose of this section is to strengthen U.S. Customs and Border Protection, ensure Border Patrol agents are ready for work, and have flexibility in scheduling.
